statements: SELECT * FROM stock_market_data WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT company_name, close_price FROM stock_market_data WHERE volume > 1000000;
SELECT stock_symbol, open_price, close_price FROM stock_market_data WHERE high_price > 200 AND low_price < 100;
SELECT company_name, volume FROM stock_market_data WHERE volume BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000;
SELECT stock_symbol, date, high_price, low_price, close_price FROM stock_market_data WHERE stock_id = 10;
SELECT stock_id, company_name, close_price FROM stock_market_data WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT company_name, volume FROM stock_market_data WHERE volume > 1000000 ORDER BY volume DESC, date ASC;
SELECT stock_symbol, open_price, high_price, low_price, close_price FROM stock_market_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT company_name, volume, close_price FROM stock_market_data WHERE volume < 500000 AND close_price > open_price;
SELECT stock_id, company_name, close_price, volume FROM stock_market_data WHERE date > '2022-01-01' AND date < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY close_price DESC, volume DESC;
SELECT * FROM HistoricalStockData;
SELECT stock_symbol, date, close_price FROM HistoricalStockData WHERE volume > 100000;
SELECT analysis_id, stock_id, analysis_date FROM StockAnalysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT stock_id, AVG(open_price) AS avg_open_price FROM HistoricalStockData GROUP BY stock_id;
SELECT date, MAX(close_price) AS max_close_price FROM HistoricalStockData GROUP BY date HAVING MAX(close_price) > 1000;
SELECT * FROM HistoricalStockData WHERE volume > 100000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT stock_symbol, close_price FROM HistoricalStockData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT stock_symbol, AVG(close_price) AS average_price FROM HistoricalStockData GROUP BY stock_symbol HAVING AVG(close_price) > 100 ORDER BY average_price DESC;
SELECT h.stock_symbol, sa.analysis_date, sa.analysis_result FROM HistoricalStockData h INNER JOIN StockAnalysis sa ON h.stock_id = sa.stock_id ORDER BY sa.analysis_date DESC;

SELECT h.stock_symbol, h.date, h.open_price, h.close_price, s.analysis_result FROM HistoricalStockData h LEFT JOIN StockAnalysis s ON h.stock_id = s.stock_id WHERE h.date >= '2022-01-01' AND h.date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM historical_stock_data;
SELECT date, ticker_symbol, close_price FROM historical_stock_data WHERE volume > 100000;
SELECT ticker_symbol, close_price FROM historical_stock_data WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(close_price) AS highest_price FROM historical_stock_data;
SELECT AVG(close_price) AS avg_price, MAX(close_price) AS highest_price FROM historical_stock_data WHERE ticker_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT * FROM historical_stock_data WHERE close_price > 100 AND volume > 10000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT date, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE ticker_symbol = 'AAPL' AND date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT ticker_symbol, MAX(close_price) AS max_price FROM historical_stock_data GROUP BY ticker_symbol HAVING max_price > 500 ORDER BY max_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_forecasts WHERE forecasted_price < 200 ORDER BY date, ticker_symbol ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT SUM(volume) AS total_volume, AVG(close_price) AS average_price FROM stock_prices WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM stocks;
SELECT stock_id, stock_symbol, stock_price FROM stocks WHERE stock_price > 100;
SELECT stock_name, stock_price FROM stocks ORDER BY stock_price DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, stock_name, stock_date FROM stocks WHERE stock_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT analysis_type, analyst_name FROM stock_analysis WHERE analysis_type LIKE '%technical%' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM stocks WHERE stock_price > 100 ORDER BY stock_symbol DESC
SELECT stock_symbol, stock_price FROM stocks WHERE stock_date >= '2022-01-01' AND stock_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT stock_name, COUNT(*) AS total_trades FROM stock_trades GROUP BY stock_name HAVING total_trades > 5 ORDER BY total_trades DESC
SELECT stock_symbol, AVG(stock_price) AS average_price FROM stocks GROUP BY stock_symbol HAVING average_price < 50
SELECT analysis_type, analyst_name FROM stock_analysis WHERE analysis_date = CURDATE()
SELECT * FROM stock_prices;
SELECT stock_symbol, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE volume > 100000;
SELECT * FROM stock_investors ORDER BY investing_since DESC;
SELECT investor_id, investor_name FROM stock_investors WHERE investment_amount > 10000;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM stock_companies ORDER BY industry, company_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount FROM stock_investors WHERE investing_since > '2020-01-01';
SELECT company_name, industry FROM stock_companies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, close_price, volume FROM stock_prices WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND volume > 1000000;
SELECT analysis_date, analysis_result FROM stock_analysis WHERE stock_symbol = 'GOOGL' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
